solution_line_template: The total minutes in the series is {num_episodes} * {episode_length_minutes} = <<{num_episodes}*{episode_length_minutes}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes

Since there are {minutes_per_hour} minutes in an hour, Erin will spend {total_minutes} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours watching the series
